segments.text: Could you tell me how to use the washer and dryer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you need help with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know how to turn them on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need change for the machines ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to put 50 cents into the washer machine and a dollar into the dryer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what do I need to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The machines will turn on once you put the quarters into the slot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's really all I have to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm here if you need any more help .
segments.speaker: S2
